drag.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: to pull something along the ground, often because it is too heavy to carry
drag.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: Inge managed to drag the table into the kitchen.
drag.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: to pull someone somewhere where they do not want to go, in a way that is not gentle
drag.translation[0].definitions[1].examp: He grabbed her arm and dragged her into the room.
drag.translation[0].definitions[2].defin: if you drag someone somewhere, you persuade or force them to come with you when they do not want to
drag.translation[0].definitions[2].examp: Mom dragged us to a classical music concert.
drag.translation[0].definitions[3].defin: to move words, pictures etc on a computer screen by pulling them along with the mouse
drag.translation[0].definitions[3].examp: You can drag and drop text like this.
drag.translation[0].definitions[4].defin: if time or an event drags, it seems to go very slowly because nothing interesting is happening
drag.translation[0].definitions[5].defin: if something is dragging along the ground, part of it is touching the ground as you move
drag.translation[0].definitions[5].examp: Your coat’s dragging in the mud.
drag.translation[0].definitions[6].defin: if you drag your leg, foot etc, you cannot lift it off the ground as you walk because it is injured
drag.translation[0].definitions[6].examp: a bird dragging its broken wing
drag.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: the act of breathing in smoke from your cigarette
drag.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: Frank took a drag on his cigarette.
drag.translation[1].definitions[1].defin: the force of air that pushes against an aircraft or a vehicle that is moving forward
drag.translation[1].definitions[1].examp: The car’s rounded edges reduce drag.
drag.translation[2].definitions[0].defin: to move words, pictures etc across a computer screen by pulling them along with the mouse
drag.translation[2].definitions[0].examp: Either drag and drop the page into a message or choose Send Page from under the File menu.
